main.name: Jake Dawson
main.description: I am just learning at the moment. I am very passionate about technology and I am learning react at the moment
main.bio: I started as a wordpress developer to earn some money to support me and my family as I learn Javascript and frameworks like React. I am trying to get React Dev under my belt and I learn best by doing. That is why I am brushing up on my skills
main.contactmessage: If anyone would like help on a project let me know.

resume.skillmessage: I am still in the learning phase of my developer carrer but I was born to be a developer.

education.description: It has taken alot of dedication and drive. But I have taught myself some skills that will be valuable

work.title: Area Manager
work.description: In this role I had to be versatile and learnt alot of skills. I learnt alot about people with alot of hiring and firing and people management involved over the years

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
